remarks.format: ## Remarks 可供类来存储信息。 is used by the classes to store information. 但如前所述，此类的成员的行为如中所述完全， ，和文档。Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **Freezable 功能：** 从继承，因此类，类提供多种特殊功能：可以声明对象，为在多个对象，变为只读以提高之间共享性能、 克隆以及变为线程安全。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关所提供的不同功能的详细信息对象，请参阅[Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## XAML 隐式集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreGradientStopObjectElements**oneOrMoreGradientStopObjectElements* 一个或多个声明使用对象元素语法的对象。One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.

span.span: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.

returns.span: An that can iterate through the collection.

span.span: An that can iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举器只允许读取集合中的数据。Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection. 枚举器不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举器位于集合中的第一项之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection. 此外会枚举数放回此位置。also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置，调用将引发异常。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，您必须调用将枚举数前移到集合，然后再读取的值的第一项。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 设置到下一项。 sets to the next item. 枚举数传递集合的末尾之后，将定位在集合中的最后一项后，调用返回`false`。After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling returns `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，则调用将引发异常。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要设置到再次集合的第一项，可以调用跟。To set to the first item of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行了更改，例如添加、 修改或删除项，则枚举器将失效且不可恢复，并且下一个调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果集合修改之间并，会返回的项的设置为，即使该枚举数已经无效。If the collection is modified between and , will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举器引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
